text:
I can think of a few reasons for this error
1. You haven't enrolled in the beta
2. You don't have the latest CLI in your machine
Can you check and let me know?

Hi Sejal, just installed the CLI earlier today. As for the beta, you’re probably right. I was thinking of experimenting in a developer/test account, but it doesn’t look like I can specifically enable betas (it says I need to be a Super Admin, but I’m the only user & super admin on the account). Since the UI loaded the Custom tab and a custom card in response to my project, I thought they might be on by default. Any insight? Sorry for the noob questions

Unfortunately, at this time, only Service and Sales enterprise accounts can use React Cards, so you have to enroll in the beta on that type of account and then you can create a sandbox to test your cards in (you can also create the sandbox from the CLI)
Ok, thanks! I’ll give it a spin.
